next_step_to_measure_sample_trees_text: In the next steps you will be asked to measure sample trees for the planting site.
recommend_at_least_sample_trees: We recommend you take at least 10-12 sample trees at random.
how_many_sample_trees_to_record: How many trees would you like to record?
enter_valid_tree_count: You should sample at least 5 and at the most 999 trees.
